channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: How one startup is using probiotics to try and ease the copper shortage
item.description: Transition Metal Solutions is applying a special cocktail to coax microbes into unlocking more copper from ore.

item.title: Best Packing Cubes for Every Kind of Trip (2026), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: Whether you’re a no-frills backpacker or a bag-checking fashionista, there’s a perfect packing cube out there for you.

item.title: What Is VO2 Max? Here’s What You Need to Know About the Longevity Metric (2026)
item.description: VO2 max can predict cardiorespiratory health and longevity, but only if you understand what the number can and can’t tell you.

item.title: 9 Best Blind Boxes—Bag Charms, Plush Pendants, and More (2026)
item.description: In the market for a mystery treat? There’s more out there than Labubu. We bought a bunch of blind boxes online, and these are our favorites.

item.title: Parloa triples its valuation in 8 months to $3B with $350M raise
item.description: The massive round was led by existing investor General Catalyst, with participation from other returning backers.

item.title: US senators demand answers from X, Meta, Alphabet and others on sexualized deepfakes
item.description: In a letter to the leaders of X, Meta, Alphabet, Snap, Reddit and TikTok, several U.S. senators are demanding the companies provide proof that they ha...

item.title: 11 Best Smartwatches (2026): Apple, Wear OS, Hybrid & Kids’ Watches
item.description: These WIRED-tested wearables reduce your reliance on a phone while keeping you connected.

item.title: Wikimedia Foundation announces new AI partnerships with Amazon, Meta, Microsoft, Perplexity and others
item.description: The AI partnerships allow companies to access the org's content, like Wikipedia, at scale.

item.title: Spotify raises its subscription prices in the U.S. again
item.description: Spotify's new price for its individual plan is $12.99 per month

item.title: Former CISA Director Jen Easterly Will Lead RSAC Conference
item.description: The longtime cybersecurity professional says she’s taking the helm of the legacy security organization at “an inflection point” for tech and the world...
